name: The Rooftop Grill
description: Upscale steakhouse with panoramic city views and craft cocktails. Perfect for special occasions.

name: Metropolitan Art Museum
description: World-class art collection spanning 5,000 years of history. Must-see exhibitions and guided tours available.

name: Central Park
description: Iconic urban oasis with walking paths, boat rentals, and seasonal activities. Great for morning jogs or picnics.

name: Blue Note Jazz Club
description: Legendary jazz venue featuring world-renowned musicians nightly. Intimate setting with excellent acoustics.

name: Artisan Coffee Roasters
description: Local favorite serving single-origin coffees and fresh pastries. Perfect spot for morning meetings or quiet work.
